actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide that all federally assisted public mass transportation facilities, equipment and services be adopted to accommodate the needs of elderly and handicapped persons.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to provide that all federally assisted public mass transportation facilities, equipment, and services be adapted to accommodate the needs of elderly and handicapped persons.

titles.title: A bill to provide that all federally assisted public mass transportation facilities, equipment and services be adopted to accommodate the needs of elderly and handicapped persons.
